topic.title: Is there a file storage facility on this system?
topic.body: I'd like to know if it's possible to store files on ZeroNet? And is there a file sharing tool? Or am I going beyond what ZeroNet is?

topic.title: NASA encounter with an alien craft - report shared on ZeroNet
topic.body: Ken Welch, long deceased, studied an amateur radio recording of a space shuttle pilot commentary while in orbit in 1989. He saw an alien craft. Read more at /1Lvuomob7U5ajuNfhnikzfkNLJerXg65sU/

1616231596_1CQzPmMXnfH3eJvpKGNfsVnUXxiHZ.body: Yep. My plan to is to have a web site on the Net, with all my files and content (ZeroNet). Then, announce the address to people on Social Media. Kind of like having a private Web site. I have stuff on Cloud drives but there is a risk it'll be shut down. So I have put them into my site. I'm not bothered if people find the site here....the intention is to release content to a specific group of people (my social media contacts) knowing it won't be stopped.
